item.title: Alright guys... i need help with skillcapes
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

public void capeEmote(int cape, int gfx1, int gfx2, int gfx3, String msg) { if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == cape) { //whatever specified stillgfx(gfx1, absY, absX); stillgfx(gfx2, absY, absX); stillgfx(gfx3, absY, absX); sM(msg); updateRequired = true; } }

Of course, it depends on how you call it. Here, in a much simpler form, you could call the method for the attack cape like such:

capeEmote(4319, 346, 427, 83, "Im a Master of Attack.");

And it’ll do the same thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Alright guys... i need help with skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @durfx durfx
item.description:
@durfx wrote:

i have this in

public void capeEmote() { if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4319) { //attack stillgfx(346, absY, absX); stillgfx(427, absY, absX); stillgfx(83, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Attack."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14077) { //strength stillgfx(482, absY, absX); stillgfx(481, absY, absX); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Strength."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4329) { //defence stillgfx(222, absY, absX); stillgfx(144, absY, absX); stillgfx(391, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Defence."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4341) { //hitpoints stillgfx(444, absY, absX); stillgfx(574, absY, absX); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Hitpoints."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4351) { //ranging stillgfx(472, absY, absX); stillgfx(474, absY, absX); stillgfx(20, absY, absX); stillgfx(21, absY, absX); stillgfx(22, absY, absX); stillgfx(23, absY, absX); stillgfx(24, absY, absX); stillgfx(25, absY, absX); stillgfx(26, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Ranging."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4347) { //prayer stillgfx(84, absY, absX); stillgfx(263, absY, absX); stillgfx(264, absY, absX); stillgfx(426, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Prayer."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4343) { //magic stillgfx(409, absY, absX); stillgfx(498, absY, absX); stillgfx(497, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Magic."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4325) { //cooking stillgfx(563, absY +1, absX); setAnimation(883); sM("Im a Master of Cooking."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4353) { //wood stillgfx(187, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Woodcutting."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4337) { //fletch stillgfx(588, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Fletching."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4335) { //fish pEmote = 0x2575; stillgfx(68, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Fishing."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4321) { //firemaking stillgfx(453, absY, absX); stillgfx(446, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Firemaking."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4327) { //crafting stillgfx(239, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Crafting."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4357) { //smithing stillgfx(436, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Smithing."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4345) { //mining stillgfx(287, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Mining."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4339) { //herblore stillgfx(267, absY, absX); stillgfx(255, absY, absX); stillgfx(259, absY, absX); stillgfx(352, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Herblore."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4317) { //agility stillgfx(422, absY, absX); stillgfx(60, absY, absX); stillgfx(62, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Agility."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4361) { //thieving stillgfx(421, absY, absX); stillgfx(143, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Thieving."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4355) { //slayer stillgfx(466, absY, absX); stillgfx(468, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Slayer."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4331) { //farming stillgfx(568, absY, absX); stillgfx(569, absY, absX); stillgfx(593, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Farming."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4333) { //runecrafting stillgfx(111, absY, absX); stillgfx(185, absY, absX); stillgfx(186, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Runecrafting."); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2771) { //Hunter stillgfx(332, absY, absX); stillgfx(247, absY, absX); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); sM("Im a Master of Hunter"); player.updateRequired = true; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2740) { //quest stillgfx(332, absY, absX); stillgfx(247, absY, absX); stillgfx(246, absY, absX); stillgfx(111, absY, absX); stillgfx(593, absY, absX); stillgfx(409, absY, absX); stillgfx(498, absY, absX); stillgfx(497, absY, absX); sM("I DID DESERT TRESSURE!"); player.updateRequired = true; } }

and i get 23 compile errors like this

client.java:34: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class client player.updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:41: cannot find symbol symbol : variable player location: class client player.updateRequired = true; Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 23 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

any idea what i did wrong…
any help is welcome
and thanks ahead for the help
